The SketchUp C API is property of Trimble(r), and we are not sure
if we are allowed to redistribute it. Until further notice,
you should register as a SketchUp developer, download it
yourself, and put it here. 

Please put the Windows version of the SketchUp C API in this folder. 

Copying and pasting the folders 'binaries' and 'headers' in
this folder should work.
